TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 为 Active Directory 和 Active Directory 应用程序模式服务器中的 ASP.NET 应用程序管理成员资格信息的存储。

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode servers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 和类使用此类 为 ASP.NET 应用程序提供成员身份服务，该服务使用 ACTIVE DIRECTORY (AD) 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) server。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using an Active Directory (AD) or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. > [!NOTE] > 使用 ADAM 服务器需要特定的配置。Using an ADAM server requires specific configuration. 有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 ADAM 配置部分。For more information, see the ADAM Configuration section below. > [!IMPORTANT] > 实例仅适用于 ASP.NET 的完全信任策略默认配置。The instance works only in the full-trust policy default configuration of ASP.NET. 若要 在任何部分信任级别使用实例，你必须对应用程序进行相应的信任策略文件的更改，或者必须创建一个部署在 GAC 中的 "沙盒" 程序集。In order to use the instance at any partial-trust level, either you must make changes to the appropriate trust policy file for your application or you must create a "sandbox" assembly that is deployed in the GAC. > > 类需要无限制 的权限才能运行。The class requires unrestricted permission to run. 此权限不会添加到 ASP.NET 提供的任何部分信任策略文件中。This permission is not added to any of the partial-trust policy files supplied with ASP.NET. 尽管向 部分信任策略文件添加权限将允许使用 类，但这样做会使 命名空间类可用于在 ASP.NET 页中运行的任何代码。Although adding the permission to a partial-trust policy file will enable use of the class, doing so makes the namespace classes available to any code running in your ASP.NET pages. 对于需要在安全、锁定模式下运行的任何 Web 服务器，不建议使用此选项。This option is not recommended for any Web servers that need to run in a secure, locked-down mode. > > 作为替代方法，可以创建调用类的 "沙盒" 程序集 。As an alternative, you can create a "sandbox" assembly that calls the class. 此程序集可以包含将方法调用转发给类的包装类 或从类派生的类 。This assembly can contain either a wrapper class that forwards method calls to the class or a class that derives from the class. 在任一情况下，包装类都必须断言无限制 权限。In either case, the wrapper class must assert unrestricted permission. 在 GAC 中部署沙盒程序集，并将程序集标记 (APTCA) 特性。Deploy the sandbox assembly in the GAC and mark the assembly with the (APTCA) attribute. 这将允许部分受信任的 ASP.NET 代码调用包装器类，因此，由于包装类在内部断言无限制的 权限，因此包装类将能够成功调用该提供程序This will enable your partially trusted ASP.NET code to call your wrapper class, and since the wrapper class internally asserts the unrestricted permission, your wrapper class will be able to successfully call the provider 你必须在 Web.config 文件中创建一个 [ConnectionStrings 元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) 条目，以确定要使用的 Active Directory 服务器、Active Directory 域或 ADAM 应用程序分区。You must create a [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) entry in the Web.config file that identifies the Active Directory server, Active Directory domain, or ADAM application partition to use. 提供程序将仅在域范围内或在域内的 subscope 中运行。The provider will only operate at domain scope, or in a subscope within a domain. 下表列出了允许的连接字符串和所使用的作用域。The following table lists allowed connection strings and the scope used. |连接字符串Connection string|范围Scope| |-----------------------|-----------| |LDAP:// \ ： [端口]LDAP://\:[port]

端口号对于 ADAM 是可选的，不需要 Active Directory。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|提供程序针对指定的域或服务器运行。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 在 AD 中，用户创建和删除是在默认的用户容器中完成的。With AD, user creation and deletion is done in the default users container. 所有其他操作（包括任何搜索方法）将以域的默认命名上下文为根。All other operations, including any search methods, will be rooted at the default naming context for the domain.

如果连接字符串指定 Active Directory 域而不是特定服务器，并且 属性为 `true` ，则 实例将始终连接到具有域 PDC 角色的服务器，以确保密码更改生效，并在 调用方法时可用。If the connection string specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server and the property is `true`, the instance will always connect to the server with the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called.

使用 ADAM 时不允许使用此连接字符串，并且将引发 。This connection string is not allowed when using ADAM, and will throw a .| |LDAP:// \ ： [端口]/\LDAP://\:[port]/\

端口号对于 ADAM 是可选的，不需要 Active Directory。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|提供程序针对指定的域或服务器运行。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 仅在指定的容器中创建和删除用户。User creation and deletion is only done in the specified container. 所有其他操作（包括任何搜索方法）都会在容器中执行子树搜索。All other operations, including any search methods, perform subtree searches rooted at the container.

对于 ADAM 服务器，容器在应用程序分区中指定应用程序分区的根目录或容器。For ADAM servers, the container specifies the root of an application partition, or a container within an application partition.

建议连接字符串定义特定容器以提高性能。We recommend that the connection string define a specific container to improve performance.| 实例将目录特性映射到 属性。The instance maps directory attributes to properties. 如果在 Web.config 文件中没有完成任何属性映射，则使用默认属性。Default attributes are used if no attribute mapping is done in the Web.config file. 有关属性映射的详细信息，请参阅类文档中的各个属性 。For more information on attribute mappings, see the individual properties in the class documentation. 下表列出了 属性及其默认属性映射。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不显式检查提供程序特性是否未映射到目录中的用户对象的核心特性。The class does not explicitly check that provider attributes are not mapped to core attributes of the user object in the directory. 必须确保不会通过映射属性公开目录中的敏感信息。You must ensure that sensitive information from the directory is not exposed through mapped attributes. |propertiesProperty|默认目录属性Default directory attribute|是否可以映射？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||securityIdentifiersecurityIdentifier|否No| ||userPrincipalNameuserPrincipalName|是，但必须是 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||commentcomment|否No| ||whenCreatedwhenCreated|否No| ||mailmail|是，但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||不适用n/a|不受 支持。Not supported by .| ||不适用n/a|不受 支持。Not supported by .| ||pwdLastSetpwdLastSet|否No| ||无none|是，但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||用户帐户控制 (AD) User-Account-Control (AD)

mDS-Msds-useraccountdisabled (ADAM) mDS-UserAccountDisabled (ADAM)|否No| ||在 Windows 2000 上从 lockoutTime 和 ad 锁定持续时间 (AD 计算) computed from lockoutTime and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

Windows Server 2003) 上的用户-帐户控制计算 (ADmsDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (AD on Windows Server 2003)

用户-帐户控制- (ADAM) msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (ADAM)|否No| ||如果用户因错误密码尝试次数过多而被锁定，则将返回 "锁定时间" 属性。If user is locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果用户因错误密码答案尝试次数过多而被锁定，则返回由定义的属性中存储的值 `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` 。If user is locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果用户因密码错误而被锁定，并且密码尝试次数过多，则返回最近的日期/时间值。If user is locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

如果该帐户未锁定，则返回1/1/1754 以了解 SQL 兼容性。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1754 for SQL compatibility.|否No| 当 和 属性均为时 `true` ， 类通过要求用户回答预先确定的问题来支持密码重置安全。When both the and properties are `true`, the class supports password-reset security by requiring the user to answer a predetermined question. 若要支持问题和答案，必须使用应用程序配置文件中的 [成员身份 (ASP.NET 设置架构) 的 Add 元素 ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) 设置以下配置特性。To support the question and answer, you must set the following configuration attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) in the application configuration file. |配置属性Configuration attribute|属性类型Attribute type| |-----------------------------|--------------------| |`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`|必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`|必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`|必须是整数类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Integer.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`|必须是类型为大整数/间隔的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`|必须是类型为大整数/间隔的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| 有关使用密码重置安全性的详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information on using password-reset security, see the property. ## Active Directory 连接Active Directory connections 当 类用于连接到 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器时， `connectionProtection` 使用应用程序配置文件中的 [提供程序的提供程序的 add 元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) 设置的特性可能会限制 类可通过连接执行的操作的类型。When the class is used to connect to an Active Directory or an Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server, the `connectionProtection` attribute that is set using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) in the application configuration file may restrict the types of operations the class can perform over the connection. `connectionProtection`属性还确定 实例将用于创建与 ACTIVE DIRECTORY 或 ADAM 服务器的连接的方法。The `connectionProtection` attribute also determines the methods the instance will use to create the connection to the Active Directory or ADAM server. 下表显示了在 `connectionProtection` 连接到 Active Directory 时属性的效果。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an Active Directory. |`connectionProtection` 设置`connectionProtection` setting|效果Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||类将连接到 Active Directory，并具有这些限制。The class will connect to an Active Directory, with these restrictions.

-任何用于设置密码的方法都将失败。- Any method that sets a password will fail. 更改密码时，Active Directory 需要安全连接。Active Directory requires a secure connection when changing passwords.
-必须 `connectionUsername` `connectionPassword` 使用应用程序配置文件中的 [成员身份 (ASP.NET 设置架构) 的 add 元素 ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) 显式设置和属性; 否则， 实例将引发 异常。- You must explicitly set the `connectionUsername` and `connectionPassword` attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) in the application configuration file; otherwise, the instance will throw a exception.| |`Secure`|类将尝试使用 SSL 连接到 Active Directory。The class will attempt to connect to Active Directory using SSL. 如果 SSL 失败，将进行第二次尝试使用签名连接到 Active Directory。If SSL fails, a second attempt to connect to Active Directory using sign-and-seal will be made. 如果两次尝试都失败，则 实例将引发 异常。If both attempts fail, the instance will throw a exception.

同时支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| 下表显示了在 `connectionProtection` 连接到 ADAM 服务器时属性的影响。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an ADAM server. |`connectionProtection` 设置`connectionProtection` setting|效果Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||类将连接到具有此限制的 ADAM 服务器。The class will connect to an ADAM server, with this restriction.

-任何用于设置密码的方法都将失败，除非你显式配置 ADAM 服务器以允许通过不安全连接发送和更改密码。- Any method that sets passwords will fail unless you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow passwords to be sent and changed over an insecure connection.

同时支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| |`Secure`|类将尝试使用 SSL 连接到 ADAM 服务器。The class will attempt to connect to the ADAM server using SSL. 如果无法建立连接，则 实例将引发 异常。If a connection cannot be made, the instance will throw a exception.

同时支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| ## ADAM 配置ADAM Configuration 使用 ADAM 服务器时，ADAM 实例必须包含定义类的架构 `User` 。When using an ADAM server, the ADAM instance must contain a schema that defines the `User` class. 您可以 `User` 使用 `MS-User.ldf` ADAM 安装目录中提供的文件的 LDIF 导入类。You can import the `User` class with an LDIF import of the `MS-User.ldf` file available in the ADAM install directory. 类将与配置为使用默认网络端口的 ADAM 服务器一起工作。The class will work with an ADAM server configured to use the default network ports. 下表显示了 ADAM 服务器需要的默认值。The following table shows the defaults expected for the ADAM server. |connectionProtection 设置connectionProtection setting|预期的 ADAM 端口Expected ADAM port| |----------------------------------|------------------------| ||389389| |`Secure`|636636| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置为使用实例的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件 。The following code examples show the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use an instance. 第一个示例使用 Active Directory 特性的默认映射，并且不支持使用问题和答案的密码重置安全性，也不支持调用搜索方法的功能。The first example uses the default mappings for Active Directory attributes, and does not support password-reset security with question-and-answer nor the ability to call search methods. 第二个示例显示了实例允许的所有属性设置 。The second example shows all the attribute settings allowed for an instance. 第一个示例是使用 Active Directory 特性的默认映射的简单配置文件。The first example is a simple configuration file using default mappings for Active Directory attributes. ``` ``` 此示例显示可用于实例的所有属性设置 。This example shows all of the attribute settings that are available for an instance of . ``` /> ``` `clientSearchTimeout``serverSearchTimeout`默认值为分钟。`clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` default to minutes. 若要更改单位，请将 `timeoutUnit` 属性值设置为 "天"、"小时"、"分钟"、"秒" 或 "毫秒"。To change the units, set the `timeoutUnit` attribute value to one of "Days", "Hours", "Minutes", "Seconds", or "Milliseconds". 如果未指定该属性，则默认值为 "分钟"。If the attribute is not specified, the default is "Minutes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的名称，但类不使用应用程序名称 。The property can be set to the name of the ASP.NET application; however, the application name is not used by the class. 因此，与其他 实现不同，访问同一 Active Directory 数据存储的所有 ASP.NET 应用程序都将始终共享相同的用户数据。Therefore, unlike other implementations, all ASP.NET applications that access the same Active Directory data store will always share the same user data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于更新 Active Directory 的数据存储中的用户密码。The method is used to update the user's password in the Active Directory data store. 无论 实例配置为使用的凭据如何，提供程序都使用 `username` 和 `oldPassword` 参数作为连接凭据连接到 Active Directory 服务器。Regardless of the credentials that the instance is configured to use, the provider connects to the Active Directory server using the `username` and `oldPassword` parameters as the connection credentials. 如果该 属性为 `true` ，则当该帐户以前被锁定，则用户无法更改其密码，因为用户尝试回答密码提示问题的次数过多。If the property is `true`, the user cannot change his or her password if the account was previously locked because the user made too many attempts to answer the password question. 用户需要等待属性中指定的分钟数， 然后再更改密码。The user will need to wait the number of minutes specified in the property before changing the password. 如果密码更改成功并且 属性为 `true` ，则重置用户的错误密码答案跟踪计数器。If the password change succeeds and the property is `true`, then the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 提供程序通过在连接字符串中指定的搜索点上执行子树搜索来查找要更新的用户实例。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 若要更改 Active Directory 服务器上的密码，该 `connectionProtection` 属性必须设置为 。To change passwords on an Active Directory server the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 使用 ADAM 服务器时， `connectionProtection` 可以将属性设置为 ，但仅当你显式配置 ADAM 服务器以允许通过不安全连接进行密码更改时才可以设置为。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password change over unsecured connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法 来更新 Active Directory 成员资格存储区中用户的密码提示问题和答案。The method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the Active Directory membership store. 在重置用户密码时，需要密码提示问题和答案会提供额外的安全层。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when resetting a user's password. 创建用户名时，用户可以提供稍后可用于重置忘记密码的问题和答案。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to reset a forgotten password. 方法将成员资格用户的密码提示问题和答案更新为新值。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user to new values. 若要使用 方法，必须在应用程序的配置文件中设置以下附加属性：In order to use the method, you must set these additional attributes in your application's configuration file: - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必须为 `true.``requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true.` - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和 `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` 必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果未满足上述条件， 则在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 实例用和参数中提供的凭据连接到 Active Directory 数据存储， `username` `password` 以验证用户名/密码组合。The instance connects to the Active Directory data store with the credentials provided in the `username` and `password` parameters to validate the user name/password combination. 问题和答案的实际更新是通过提供程序的已配置连接凭据来执行的。The actual update of the question and answer is performed with the configured connection credentials of the provider. 如果为方法提供了不正确的密码 ，目录服务器将递增跟踪无效密码尝试次数的计数器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the directory server will increment the counters that track invalid password attempts. 这可能会导致用户被锁定，并且在通过调用方法清除锁定状态 或在目录传递中指定的锁定持续时间之前，将无法登录。This can result in the user being locked and unable to log on until either the lock status is cleared by a call to the method or the locked duration specified in the directory passes. 如果问题和答案的更新成功并且 属性为，则将 `true` 重置用户的错误密码答案跟踪计数器。If the update to the question and answer succeeds and the property is `true`, the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 使用方法对密码答案进行加密， 然后将其存储在 Active Directory 数据存储中。The password answer is encrypted using the method before it is stored in the Active Directory data store. 加密密钥和算法由 MachineKey 元素指定， [ (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)) configuration 元素。The encryption key and algorithm are specified by the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)) configuration element. 必须指定 [MachineKey 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)) 元素的解密属性， 该类不支持自动生成的加密密钥。The decryption attribute on the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)) element must be specified, the class does not support auto-generated encryption keys. 密码提示问题的最大长度为256个字符。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密码答案的最大长度为128个字符。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 除之外的所有参数值中，还会修整前导空格和尾随空格 `password` 。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values except for `password`. 提供程序通过在连接字符串中指定的搜索点上执行子树搜索来查找要更新的用户实例。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 类调用，以在 Active Directory 数据存储区中创建新用户。The method is called by the class to create a new user in the Active Directory data store. 对于 Active Directory 和 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器，此 类要求目录中的实例类为 `user` 。For both Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) servers, the class requires that the instance class in the directory be `user`. 不支持等其他用户类 `inetOrgPerson` 。Alternative user classes such as `inetOrgPerson` are not supported. 当使用 Active Directory 服务器并且用户名映射到 `userPrincipalName` 属性时， 该类会自动为参数生成一个随机的20个字符的用户名 `sAMAccountName` 。When using an Active Directory server and the user name is mapped to the `userPrincipalName` attribute, the class will automatically generate a random 20-character user name for the `sAMAccountName` parameter on your behalf. 参数默认为以下最大长度。Parameters default to the following maximum lengths. |参数Parameter|最大长度Maximum length| |---------------|--------------------| |`username`|如果使用属性，则为64个字符 `userPrincipalName` 。64 characters if using the `userPrincipalName` attribute. 如果使用 `sAMAccountName` 属性，则常见限制为20个字符或更少。If using the `sAMAccountName` attribute, the common restriction is 20 characters or less.| |`password`|128个字符。128 characters.| |`email`|256 个字符。256 characters.| |`passwordQuestion`|256 个字符。256 characters.| |`passwordAnswer`|加密之前和之后为128个字符。128 characters before and after encrypting.| 返回的实例的属性 限制为1024个字符。The property on the returned instance is limited to 1024 characters. 如果通过减少这些属性允许的最大长度来修改目录架构，则这些长度将优先。If the directory schema has been modified by reducing the maximum allowable lengths for these attributes, these lengths will take precedence. 在创建用户之前， 类将确保用户名是唯一的。Before creating the user, the class will make sure the user name is unique. 如果 实例配置为要求唯一的电子邮件地址，则它还将确保电子邮件地址是唯一的。If the instance is configured to require unique email addresses, it will also make sure the email address is unique. 在中，如果用户名映射到，则会执行垃圾搜索，从而强制执行用户名的 Active Directory `userPrincipalName` 。In an Active Directory user-name uniqueness is enforced by performing a GC search when the user name is mapped to `userPrincipalName`. 如果 `sAMAccountName` 使用，则目录将自动强制实施 `sAMAccountName` 跨 Active Directory 域的唯一性。If `sAMAccountName` is used, then the directory will automatically enforce uniqueness of the `sAMAccountName` across the Active Directory domain. ADAM 服务器会在 `userPrincipalName` 所有应用程序分区中自动强制实施用户名的唯一名称。An ADAM server will automatically enforce user name uniqueness of the `userPrincipalName` across all application partitions. 电子邮件地址的唯一性是通过执行子树搜索来执行的，该地址从创建用户的容器的根目录开始搜索。Uniqueness of the email address is enforced by performing a subtree search for a duplicate email address starting at the root of the container in which users are created. 如果连接到 Active Directory 并且在连接字符串中未指定任何容器) 或在连接字符串中指定的容器，则这是默认用户容器 (。This is either the default user container (if connected to an Active Directory and no container was specified in the connection string) or the container specified in the connection string. 类直接在连接字符串中指定的用户容器中创建用户。The class creates the user directly in the user container specified in the connection string. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 对于要在 Active Directory 服务器上设置的密码， `connectionProtection` 特性必须设置为 。For passwords to be set on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 使用 ADAM 服务器时， `connectionProtection` 可以将属性设置为 ，但仅当你显式配置 adam 服务器以允许通过不安全连接进行密码更改时。When an ADAM server is being used, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. 除了之外的所有字符串参数值，前导空格和尾随空格都将被截断 `password` 。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values except `password`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 (不建议) 或 "创建子实例"、"删除子实例" 和 "设置密码" 访问权限，否则不能创建新用户。You cannot create new users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "create child instance," "delete child instance," and "set password" access rights. "删除子实例" 访问权限是必需的，因为创建用户是一个多步骤过程，如果用户创建的任何步骤失败， 该类将删除该用户实例，而不是在目录中保留部分构造的用户实例。The "delete child instance" access right is required because creating a user is a multi-step process, and if any step of user creation fails, the class will delete the user instance rather than leave a partially constructed user instance in the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示 实例配置为使用的当前安全级别。The property indicates the current level of security that the instance is configured to use. 属性基于 `connnectionProtection` 应用程序配置文件中的[成员身份 (ASP.NET 设置架构) 的 add 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100))设置的属性。The property is based on the `connnectionProtection` attribute set with the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/whae3t94(v=vs.100)) in the application configuration file. `connectionProtection`特性只能在 配置文件中设置为或。The `connectionProtection` attribute can only be set to or in the configuration file. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目将 实例配置为使用 SSL 安全协议连接到 Active Directory 服务器。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to use the SSL security protocol to connect to an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会立即删除由参数标识的用户 `username` 。The method immediately removes the user identified by the `username` parameter. 由于 Active Directory 的数据存储不会将用户信息存储在目录的单独区域中， `deleteAllRelatedData` 因此将忽略参数，但该参数必须设置为 `true` 或 `false` 在调用方法时设置 。Since the Active Directory data store does not store user information in separate areas of the directory, the `deleteAllRelatedData` parameter is ignored, although it must be set to either `true` or `false` when calling the method. 类通过对连接字符串确定的用户容器中的用户名执行单级搜索，查找要删除的用户实例。The class finds the user instance to delete by performing a single-level search for the user name in the users container determined by the connection string. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. `username` 长度不得超过64个字符。`username` must be 64 characters or less. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你无法删除用户，除非用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 (不建议) 或 "删除子实例" 访问权限。You cannot delete users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "delete child instances" access right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否可以使用 方法重置用户的密码。The property indicates whether you can use the method to reset a user's password. 在 应用程序的配置文件中，使用 `enablePasswordReset` [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置该属性。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enablePasswordReset` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element. 仅 `true` 当以下 [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素设置时，才能设置该属性。You can only set the property `true` when the following [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element settings have been made. - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必须为 `true`。`requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true`. - 必须修改 Active Directory 架构，使其包含用于存储密码提示问题和答案的属性，以及用于密码答案更改尝试的三个跟踪字段。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, as well as the three tracking fields for password-answer change attempts. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`、、、 `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount` `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime` 和 `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` 必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果未满足上述条件， 则在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 当应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串指定的 Active Directory 域而不是特定服务器时，该 实例将始终连接到域控制器，该控制器具有域的 PDC 角色，以确保密码更改生效，并在 调用方法时可用。When the connection string in the application configuration file specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server, the instance will always connect to the domain controller that has the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 即使 属性为 `true` ，也不能重置用户密码，除非用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 (不建议) 或 "重置密码" 访问权限。Even if the property is `true`, you cannot reset user passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目将 实例配置为启用密码重置。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它使用给定了 "重置密码" 访问权限的用户的显式凭据。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Web.config 文件中放置用户凭据时，会存在潜在的安全威胁。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 对包含 Web.config 文件的目录具有访问权限的用户可以读取该文件，从而查看凭据。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 有关如何防范此威胁的详细信息，请参阅 [使用受保护的配置加密配置信息](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/53tyfkaw(v=vs.100))。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/53tyfkaw(v=vs.100)). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于搜索 Active Directory 服务器可能会消耗大量资源，因此 可以使用属性关闭面向搜索的 方法。Because searching an Active Directory server is potentially resource intensive, the property enables you to turn off search-oriented methods. 在 应用程序的配置文件中，使用 `enableSearchMethods` [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置该属性。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element. 当 属性为时 `false` ，以下方法不可用：When the property is `false`, the following methods are not available: - - - 提供程序使用子树搜索，从连接字符串中指定的搜索点开始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 建议您不要在生产系统上启用搜索，直到您确认类发出的搜索查询 不会对目录服务器的性能产生负面影响。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 由于 类是为无状态 Web 环境设计的，因此无法使用由基础 api 公开的分页优化 。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着，搜索大型目录时的分页操作非常昂贵，应避免这样做。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终针对在连接字符串中配置的目录服务器发出，或在指向域的连接字符串的情况下，为自动选择的服务器。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 提供程序不会将全局编录用于其搜索方法。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目将 实例配置为允许搜索 Active Directory 服务器。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable searching an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 从与参数匹配的 Active Directory 存储中获取包含用户记录的 `emailToMatch` 。The method gets a containing the user records from the Active Directory store that match the `emailToMatch` parameters. 按电子邮件地址按升序顺序返回用户记录。The user records are returned sorted in ascending order by email address. `emailToMatch`参数限制为256个字符。The `emailToMatch` parameter is limited to 256 characters. 类将使用 `clientSearchTimeout` 和 `serverSearchTimeout` 配置值发出搜索。The class will issue the search using both the `clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` configuration values. 由于 类使用每页包含512行的页对目录服务器执行搜索，因此超时适用于类所获取的每个结果页 。Since the class performs searches against the directory server using pages with 512 rows per page, the time-outs apply to each page of results fetched by the class. 例如，如果搜索查询导致了1000行的数据，则 类会将此信息作为两页数据提取。For example, if a search query results in 1,000 rows of data, the class will fetch this information as two pages of data. 这意味着当 类请求第二页数据时，客户端和搜索超时值将从零开始计数。This means that the client and search time-outs will start counting from zero when the class requests the second page of data. 方法返回的结果 受 `pageIndex` 和参数的约束 `pageSize` 。The results returned by the method are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数指定 要在中返回的最大实例数 。The `pageSize` parameter specifies the maximum number of instances to return in the . `pageIndex`参数指定要返回的结果页，其中 0 (零) 指示第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter specifies which page of results to return, where 0 (zero) indicates the first page. `totalRecords`参数是 `out` 设置为在 Active Directory 数据存储中找到的匹配成员身份用户总数的参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of matching membership users found in the Active Directory data store. 例如，如果已配置的数据存储有13个用户，并且值为 `pageIndex` 1 且为 `pageSize` 5，则 返回的将包含第六到第十个用户。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured data store, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. 可以通过在 应用程序的配置文件中使用 `enableSearchMethods` [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置属性，来控制是否允许搜索用户。You can control whether to allow searching for users, by setting the property in the application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element. 如果将 属性设置为， `false` 则会 引发 异常。Setting the property to `false` causes the method to throw a exception. 提供程序使用子树搜索，从连接字符串中指定的搜索点开始。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 建议您不要在生产系统上启用搜索，直到您确认类发出的搜索查询 不会对目录服务器的性能产生负面影响。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 由于 类是为无状态 Web 环境设计的，因此无法使用由基础 api 公开的分页优化 。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着，搜索大型目录时的分页操作非常昂贵，应避免这样做。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终针对在连接字符串中配置的目录服务器发出，或在指向域的连接字符串的情况下，为自动选择的服务器。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 提供程序不会将全局编录用于其搜索方法。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的方法 调用类的 方法 来检索随机密码。The method of the class calls the method of the class to retrieve a random password. 密码长度设置为属性的值 。The password length is set to the value of the property. 密码长度绝不能小于14。The password length can never be less than 14. 您可以 通过 直接从类的提供程序属性引用类来专门调用方法 。You can specifically call the method by referencing the class directly from the Provider property of the class. 生成的密码只包含字母数字字符和以下标点符号：！ @ # $% ^& \* () _-+ = [{]};： <>|./？。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: !@#$%^&\*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?. 生成的密码中不包含隐藏或不可打印的控制字符。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. 生成的密码将至少包含属性中指定的非字母数字字符数 。The generated password will contain at least the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the property. 生成的密码不会在属性中用正则表达式进行测试 。The generated password will not be tested with the regular expression in the property. > [!NOTE] > 类不会生成与目录中设置的复杂性要求匹配的密码。The class does not generate passwords that match complexity requirements set in the directory. 可以生成随机密码，该密码会导致目录设置的密码复杂性规则失败。It is possible to generate a random password that fails the password complexity rules set by the directory.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts As Integer
public: virtual property int MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts { int get(); };
member this.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts : int

summary.span: 获取用户回答密码重置问题时允许失败的次数。

span.span: Gets the number of failed answer attempts a user is allowed for the password-reset question.

value.span: 在帐户被锁定之前，允许用户回答密码提示问题的失败次数。

span.span: The number of failed password answer attempts a user is allowed before the account is locked.

value.span: 默认值为 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为时 `true` ，用户必须回答密码问题才能重置其密码。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 允许用户在属性所建立的时间范围内进行有限数量的答案尝试 。The user is allowed a limited number of answer attempts within the time window established by the property. 如果密码答案尝试次数大于或等于属性中存储的值 ，则用户将被锁定，以便进一步尝试存储在属性中的分钟数 。If the number of password answer attempts is greater than or equal to the value stored in the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不控制用户在锁定之前可以执行的失败登录尝试次数。Active Directory 服务器处理失败的登录尝试，并且不受此属性的值的影响。This property does not control the number of failed logon attempts a user can make before being locked out. The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 在 应用程序的配置文件中，使用 `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置该属性。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element. 如果未在应用程序的配置文件中设置该属性，则 属性将设置为的默认值 `5` 。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `5`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目可将 实例配置为锁定在10分钟时间范围内尝试输入密码答案的三次尝试失败的用户。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，则不会再进一步回答密码问题。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取用户多次未能正确回答密码提示问题后用户帐户的锁定时间长度。

span.span: Get the length of time for which a user account is locked out after the user makes too many bad password-answer attempts.

value.span: 用户多次提供错误的密码提示问题答案后的锁定时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time, in minutes, that a user is locked out after providing too many incorrect password answers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为时 `true` ，用户必须回答密码问题才能重置其密码。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 如果用户在 由属性指定的观察时间段内不能提供正确的答案（等于属性值 ），则用户将被锁定，以确定属性中包含的分钟数 。If the user fails to supply the correct answer a consecutive number of times equal to the property value within the observation time period specified by the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会设置用户在未能输入有效密码后锁定的持续时间。This property does not set the duration a user is locked out after failing to enter a valid password. Active Directory 服务器处理失败的登录尝试，并且不受此属性的值的影响。The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 建议将 属性设置为与指定的帐户锁定持续时间相同的值，因为在 Active Directory 配置中失败的登录尝试次数过多。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration specified for too many failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 这将为用户提供一致的自动锁定行为，无论用户是否因登录尝试失败或密码答案是否被锁定。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users regardless of whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 在 应用程序的配置文件中，使用 `passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration` [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置该属性。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element. 如果未在应用程序的配置文件中设置该属性，则该 属性将设置为默认值30分钟。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 30 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目可将 实例配置为锁定在10分钟时间范围内尝试输入密码答案的三次尝试失败的用户。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，则不会再进一步回答密码问题。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

span.span: If the interval between each failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the instance treats each failed attempt as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性与属性结合使用 ，以帮助防止不需要的源通过重复尝试来猜测成员资格用户的密码或密码答案。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 当用户尝试登录、更改其密码或重置其密码时，在指定的时间范围内只允许一定数量的连续尝试。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 时间范围的长度由 属性指定，该属性用于标识无效尝试之间允许的分钟数。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果用户重置其密码的连续失败尝试次数等于属性中存储的值 ，并且自上次无效尝试以来所经过的时间小于为属性指定的分钟数 ，则用户帐户被锁定，以确定属性中包含的分钟数 。If the number of consecutive failed attempts a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the user account s locked out for the number of minutes contained in the property. 如果当前失败尝试与上次失败尝试之间的间隔大于 属性设置，则当前的无效尝试将计为第一次尝试。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first attempt. 如果在达到允许的最大尝试无效次数之前提供了有效密码答案，则无效密码答案尝试的计数将设置为零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果在达到允许的最大尝试无效次数之前提供了有效密码，则无效密码尝试次数和无效密码答案尝试计数将设置为零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 建议将 属性设置为与在 Active Directory 配置中为失败登录尝试次数指定的帐户锁定持续时间相同的值。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration that is specified for the maximum number of failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 这将为用户提供一致的自动锁定行为，使用户无论登录尝试失败或密码提示答案是否被锁定。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 在 应用程序的配置文件中，使用 `passwordAttemptWindow` [成员资格元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置该属性。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) element. 如果未在应用程序的配置文件中设置该属性，则该 属性将设置为默认值10分钟。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 10 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目可将 实例配置为锁定在10分钟时间范围内尝试输入密码答案的三次尝试失败的用户。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，则不会再进一步回答密码问题。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取用于评估密码复杂性的正则表达式。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity. 此 属性不用于验证方法中自动生成的密码 。The property is not used to validate auto-generated passwords in the method. 在 应用程序配置中，使用成员资格元素的特性在应用程序配置中设置属性， `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` [ (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) 配置元素。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了应用程序 Web.config 文件的部分中 [ (ASP.NET 设置架构) 配置元素的成员身份元素 ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) `system.web` 。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1b9hw62f(v=vs.100)) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用类的实例 来提供成员身份服务，并将特性设置 `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` 为一个正则表达式，该表达式用于验证密码是否满足以下条件：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 超过7个字符。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊 (非字母数字) 字符。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密码不符合这些条件，则成员资格提供程序不接受该密码。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和 `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` 必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果未满足上述条件， 则在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. > [!NOTE] > 您可以在创建用户时要求密码问题和答案，但将属性设置 为， `false` 以防止用户使用类更改其密码 。You can require a password question and answer when creating a user, but set the property to `false` to prevent users from changing their passwords using the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 Web.config 条目，该条目将 实例配置为启用密码重置。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它使用给定了 "重置密码" 访问权限的用户的显式凭据。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Web.config 文件中放置用户凭据时，会存在潜在的安全威胁。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 对包含 Web.config 文件的目录具有访问权限的用户可以读取该文件，从而查看凭据。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 有关如何防范此威胁的详细信息，请参阅 [使用受保护的配置加密配置信息](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/53tyfkaw(v=vs.100))。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/53tyfkaw(v=vs.100)). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法，将 Active Directory 数据存储区中的用户的密码重置为新随机生成的值。The method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the Active Directory data store to a new randomly generated value. 返回新密码。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 不保证通过方法创建的随机密码 在属性中传递正则表达式 。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机密码会满足和属性所建立的条件 。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 如果为方法提供的答案不正确 ，则跟踪无效密码答案尝试的内部计数器会递增1。If an incorrect answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 这可能会导致用户在通过调用方法清除锁定状态之前无法登录 。This can result in the user being unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供了正确的密码答案并且用户当前未锁定，则跟踪无效密码尝试的内部计数器将重置为零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 属性。For more information, see the and properties. 将从所有参数值中去除前导空格和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. 您可以 。To set passwords on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 使用 ADAM 服务器时， `connectionProtection` 可以将属性设置为 ，但前提是你显式配置了 ADAM 服务器以允许通过不安全连接进行密码更改。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你无法重置密码，除非用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 (不建议) 或 "重置密码" 访问权限。You cannot reset passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. 若要重置密码，必须满足以下所有条件：To reset a password, all of the following conditions must be true: - 属性必须设置为 `true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 必须修改 Active Directory 架构，使其包含用于存储密码提示问题和答案的属性，以及用于密码答案更改的三个跟踪字段。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, and the three tracking fields for password answer changes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount` `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime` `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime` 必须在应用程序配置文件中设置、、、和属性。The `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime` attributes must be set in the application configuration file. - 属性必须设置为 `true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 用于连接到 Active Directory 数据存储区的安全上下文 (进程帐户或显式凭据) 必须具有足够的权限才能更改密码。The security context for connecting to the Active Directory data store (either the process account or the explicit credentials) must have sufficient privileges to change passwords. 用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 (不建议) 或 "重置密码" 访问权限。The credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. > [!NOTE] > 在 Active Directory 服务器上设置的安全策略可能会使方法无法 生成满足策略的密码。Security policies set on the Active Directory server may make it impossible for the method to generate a password that satisfies the policies. 方法的默认实现 将在运行 Windows Server 2003 SP1 的域控制器上生成满足默认密码策略的密码。The default implementation of the method will generate passwords that satisfy the default password policies on domain controllers running Windows Server 2003 SP1. 如果由于 Active Directory 服务器上的安全策略而无法重置密码，则 会引发。If the password cannot be reset due to security remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 类调用，以根据 Active Directory 数据存储验证用户凭据。This method is called by the class to validate user credentials against the Active Directory data store. 如果 属性为， `true` 并且提供的凭据有效，则会重置错误密码答案的用户跟踪计数器。If the property is `true` and the supplied credentials are valid, the user's tracking counters for bad password answers are reset. `false` 如果在以下情况下提供了正确的凭据，则该方法可能会返回：The method may return `false` when the correct credentials are supplied, under the following circumstances: 1. 由于登录尝试失败次数过多，目录服务器已锁定用户帐户。The user account was locked out by the directory server because of too many failed logon attempts. 在目录的锁定持续时间通过之前，用户将无法登录。The user will not be able to log on until the directory's lockout duration passes. 2. 如果 属性为 `true` ，则当用户提供错误密码答案太多次时，用户帐户将被锁定。If the property is `true`, the user account will be locked if the user supplied a bad password answer too many times. 用户的帐户将在属性中指定的时间过后解除锁定 。The user's account will unlock after the time specified in the property has passed. 3. 用户必须存在于连接字符串中指定的容器中。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 为位于不同容器或不同域中的用户帐户提供有效的凭据。Valid credentials are supplied for a user account located in a different container or in a different domain. 用户必须存在于连接字符串中指定的容器中。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 验证用户时，提供程序通过使用指定的用户名和密码（而不是在应用程序配置文件中配置的凭据）连接到 Active Directory 的数据存储区来验证凭据。When validating a user, the provider validates the credentials by connecting to the Active Directory data store using the specified user name and password, not the credentials configured in the application configuration file. 不过， 由于以下原因，实例将使用配置的凭据连接到目录。However, the instance will connect to the directory using the configured credentials for the following reasons. - 若要确认用户在搜索范围内是否存在由 实例的连接字符串确定的。To confirm that a user exists within the search scope as determined by the instance's connection string. 提供程序在连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始使用子树搜索来确定用户是否存在。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string to determine whether a user exists. 用户必须存在于指定的容器中。The user must exist in the specified container. 不会验证在连接字符串的指定容器外有效的凭据。Credentials that are valid outside the connection string's specified container will not be validated. 有关 连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅类主题。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. - 如果 属性为 `true` ，则 实例将使用配置的凭据来加载用户实例，以检查用户是否已被锁定，因为他（她）的尝试更改密码答案失败了太多。If the property is `true`, the instance will use the configured credentials to load the user instance to check whether the user has been locked out because he or she has made too many failed attempts to change the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 连接到已启用 "来宾" 帐户的 Active Directory 域控制器是一个潜在的安全威胁。Connecting to an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled is a potential security threat. 在启用了 "来宾" 帐户的 Active Directory 域控制器上进行的所有验证尝试都将成功。All validation attempts made on an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled will succeed. 若要在使用 Active Directory 域控制器时提高安全性，应禁用域控制器上的 "来宾" 帐户。To improve security when using an Active Directory domain controller, you should disable the "Guest" account on the domain controller. 当满足以下条件之一时，实例将尝试对 Active Directory 进行并发绑定：The instance will attempt a concurrent bind against Active Directory when one of the following conditions is met: - 将 属性设置为 。The property is set to . - 属性设置为 ，并且实例选择 SSL 来保护连接。The property is set to and SSL is chosen by the instance to secure the connection. 此外，若要进行并发绑定，必须满足以下条件：In addition, for a concurrent bind to be made, the following conditions must be true: - 目录服务器必须在 Windows Server 2003 上运行。The directory server must be running on Windows Server 2003. - 运行实例的 Web 服务器的操作系统 必须支持并发绑定 (例如，Windows server 2003) 。The operating system of the Web server running the instance must support concurrent binds (for example, Windows Server 2003). 使用并发绑定时，不会在目录中更新用户的上次登录日期;因此，该 属性不能依赖于。When a concurrent bind is used, the last logon date for the user is not updated in the directory; therefore, the property cannot be relied on. 前导空格和尾随空格从参数中去除 `username` 。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter.
